import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import ItemCard from './ItemCard' import axios from 'axios' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import AuctionBid from './AuctionBid'; const ListSingularAuction = () => { const api = "http://localhost:8081/auction/api/v1/item" const [itemList, setItemList] = useState([]) const params = useParams(); useEffect(() => { loadItems() }, []) const loadItems = () => { console.log("THE ID USING PARAMS IS: " + params.item_id) axios.get(api + '/' + params.item_id) .then(response => {setItemList(response.data)}) .catch(error => console.log('unable to load data')) } return(
Name: {itemList.name}
Description: {itemList.description}
Price: Â£{itemList.price}


Bid on this item!


setUsername(event.target.value)} placeholder="Enter username"/> {invalidUsername && Username cannot be blank}
setPassword(event.target.value)} /> {invalidPassword && Password cannot be blank}
setBidAmount(event.target.value)} /> {invalidBidAmount && Bid Amount cannot be blank}
) } export default ListSingularAuction
